title: Tanning Bed, Under Cabinet Kitchen Lighting, Yoga & Spin Bike Rooms
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 823 Sq.
With its bold, modernist design and vibrant color scheme, Motif is far from ordinary.
Our one, two and three bedroom apartment homes combine resort-style amenities with luxurious and spacious floor plans in the heart of Warner Center.
With its unique features such as high ceilings and upgraded chef’s kitchen, Motif is a cut above the rest.

NEST Thermostat-Central A/C and Heating, Dishwasher, Granite Counter Tops, High Ceilings, Walk-In Closets, Patio and/or Balcony, Ceiling Fans in Living Room and Bedrooms, Washer/Dryer in Unit, Glass Shaker Accent Cabinets, Microwave, Oversized Garden Style Tubs, Wheelchair Access, Under Cabinet Kitchen Lighting, Vinyl Wood Style Flooring, Gas Range Oven, Side by Side Refrigerators with Filtered Water and Ice Dispenser
Prices and promotion subject to changed at any time.,

Clubhouse with 24/7 Common Areas for Social Gatherings, 24 Hour Fitness Center including Free Weights and Cardio Equipment, Poolside BBQ / Outdoor Entertaining Areas, Bocce Ball Court, Package Lockers, Controlled Access/Gated, Yoga & Spin Bike Rooms, Large Conference Room, On-Site Management and Maintenance, Above Ground Parking Garage, Short Term Leases, Dog Run, Elevators, Two Separate Resort Style Pool and Jacuzzis, Two Separate Poolside Aqua Lounges, Valet Trash Pick-Up, Bike Racks, Tanning Bed, Gated Dog Park, Night Patrol
Pet rent and additional deposit for pet.
